txt.en: You worthless cur! Defeat only earns you failure!
Your education continues with a trip far to the east to Tirith Rhaw, a tower in lands controlled by the enemy.

'Far to the east is a tower which often belongs to the enemy. We assail it now and again, but far too often, we are driven out.

'In time, we'll build a wall of bodies of recruits like yourself that we can use to shield the true forces of Angmar as we storm into the enemy's base and crush them!

'For now, I must send you on a fool's errand to learn the location of the tower. Travel east, across the Hoardale River and into the Coldfells, find Tirith Rhaw, and scout the area, then return to me!'
Tirith Rhaw lay far to the east beyond the Hoardale River.\n\nSoldier Nartul directed you to scout out Tirith Rhaw in the Coldfells.
'Survived the journey? Good for you, maggot. Before you get excited, you should learn your place...firmly beneath my heel, worm!'
Soldier Nartul awaits your return at Gramsfoot.\n\nYou discovered and scouted the area surrounding Tirith Rhaw.
'Listen well to me, maggot. Standing here talking to me only draws my ire. Make your way east, across the Hoardale, and find Tirith Rhaw. Then, and only then, do I want to see your face!'
Return to Soldier Nartul at Gramsfoot
